alert.note: Alert for Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Watch issued December 25 at 1:23AM MST until December 28 at 12:00AM MST by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE MONDAY NIGHT THROUGH TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...South winds 30 to 40 mph, with gusts up to 65 mph, are possible. * WHERE...Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains, Madison River Valley and Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains. * WHEN...From late Monday night through Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. The strong winds could lead to areas of blowing and drifting snow, especially in prone areas
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts and warnings for updates.

area.areaDesc: Gallatin and Madison County Mountains and Centennial Mountains; Madison River Valley; Ruby Mountains and Southern Beaverhead Mountains
